mapper.sql: deviceid, orgid, branchid, terminalid, hardkey, name, position, ip, iip, mac, schedulestatus, filestatus, status, description, onlineflag, appname, sign, vname, vcode, mtype, type, ostype, devicegroupid, lontitude, latitude, city, addr1, addr2, externalid, externalname, other, createtime, activetime, refreshtime, devicegridid, xpos, ypos, powerflag, poweron, poweroff, volumeflag, volume, boardinfo, storageused, storageavail, upgradeflag, appfileid, tagflag, temperature, downloadspeed, downloadbytes, networkmode, networksignal, brightness, tags
mapper.select: select d.* from device d, org o where d.orgid = o.orgid and o.orgtype = '${orgtype}' and d.status = '1' order by deviceid
mapper.delete: update device set status = '0', hardkey = null, ip = '', iip = '', mac = '', appname = '', sign = '', vname = '', vcode = 0, mtype = '', lontitude = '', latitude = '', city = '', addr1 = '', addr2 = '', boardinfo = '', upgradeflag = '0', appfileid = 0 where deviceid = #{deviceid}
mapper.update: update device d, devicegroup dg set d.devicegroupid = 0 where d.devicegroupid = dg.devicegroupid and d.branchid != dg.branchid
update device set onlineflag = 0 where refreshtime is null or (unix_timestamp()-unix_timestamp(refreshtime) > 60)
update device set appfileid = 0, upgradeflag = '0' where upgradeflag = '2' and appfileid = #{appfileid}
mapper.insert:
insert into device(orgid, branchid, terminalid, name, type, status) values
(#{item.orgid}, #{item.branchid}, #{item.terminalid}, #{item.name}, #{item.type}, #{item.status})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

mapper.update:
update device
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
terminalid = #{terminalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hardkey = #{hardkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
iip = #{iip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schedulestatus = #{schedulestatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
filestatus = #{filestatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
onlineflag = #{onlineflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
appname = #{appname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vname = #{vname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vcode = #{vcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mtype = #{mtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
ostype = #{ostype,jdbcType=CHAR},
devicegroupid = #{devicegroupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lontitude = #{lontitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr1 = #{addr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr2 = #{addr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
externalid = #{externalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
externalname = #{externalname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
activetime = #{activetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
refreshtime = #{refreshtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
devicegridid = #{devicegridid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xpos = #{xpos,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ypos = #{ypos,jdbcType=INTEGER},
powerflag = #{powerflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
poweron = #{poweron,jdbcType=TIME},
poweroff = #{poweroff,jdbcType=TIME},
volumeflag = #{volumeflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
volume = #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
boardinfo = #{boardinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
storageused = #{storageused,jdbcType=BIGINT},
storageavail = #{storageavail,jdbcType=BIGINT},
upgradeflag = #{upgradeflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
appfileid = #{appfileid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tagflag = #{tagflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
downloadspeed = #{downloadspeed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
downloadbytes = #{downloadbytes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
networkmode = #{networkmode,jdbcType=CHAR},

brightness = #{brightness,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tags = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
